thread.title: Bumper Summer For Acc Liverpool Production TeamTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Bumper Summer For Acc Liverpool Production TeamTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Bumper Summer For Acc Liverpool Production Team Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
ACC Liverpool’s production team has experienced its busiest summer, providing full services for a series of events.
The 19-strong department has led technical support for conferences including NHS Confederation, the British Contact Lens Association and Airmic. Services included providing live streaming, interactive voting and the recording of all plenary sessions for NHS Confederation. The team also provided AV for the conference dinner which took place at St George’s Hall, Liverpool city centre.
Other events included Jamfest – which took place in Echo Arena – and support for the city’s Rock ‘n’ Roll Liverpool Marathon, making it the busiest summer period since the venue opened in 2008.
Nicky Norman, senior production and technical manager, said: “We provided production for a series of conference, entertainment and sporting events during the summer which is a reflection of the services, expertise and equipment we can provide for our clients.
“We are also able to deliver full production for off-site dinners. Through our At Your Service programme, we can provide just one point of contact for our client for their entire technical services – from AV to equipment – at ACC Liverpool and elsewhere.”
The team will provide production for a series of forthcoming events at ACC Liverpool includingRenewableUK, CostCutter and UK Stroke Forum.
Meanwhile the venue, home to BT Convention Centre, Echo Arena and Exhibition Centre Liverpool, continues to invest in technical equipment in addition to enhancements last year which included new LED lighting through the galleria; high-definition projectors and switchers in the auditorium and meeting rooms, and an infrared assisted listening system.
